column3: @laanwj please take a look.\nnote: this includes the zh_TW "fix" as well from the aforementioned issue.

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16966](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16966.html) (ui: make send a wizard by Sjors)

If you

- Please change this on Transifex, never manually on the branch. The script will automatically add and remove translations to synchronize with transifex.\n- We do not do translation updates on master (see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17049#issuecomment-538399860).

> The correct way to update would be to delete all existing translation files and run the script afterwards. This is the result.

~~Wait, I'm pretty sure the script already does this? If not, we need to fix the script so this keeps happening automatically.~~
You're right, it doesn't!
